There are multiple ways to send Prometheus metrics to Grafana Cloud, but using the remote write feature offers several key benefits.

You should consider using Prometheus remote write if you:

- Already have a Prometheus setup and prefer not to install Grafana Alloy or any other collectors.
- Want to explore Grafana Cloud without making significant changes to your existing configuration.
- Intend to send only certain metrics to Grafana Cloud while keeping other metrics stored locally in your Prometheus.
